alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 31 at 12:59PM PST until February 01 at 8:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 32 degrees will result in frost formation. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 4 PM PST this afternoon. For the Frost Advisory, from midnight tonight to 8 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
